title: My purchase history is haywire.
body: riot. you tell us we need to buy 6 of something to earn 1 free something but you gave us no way to in game of keeping track of how many we have bought other then by our purchase history. But if anyone else's purchase history is like mine that would be near impossible. You finish this event at 5pm tonight and It'd be annoying if i missed out on a free skin by 1 or 2 mystery gifts when it's blatantly obvious why I'm buying the skins, to take advantage of the event.
